planet.name: AB Pic b
planet.description: AB Pictoris is a star in the constellation of Pictor. Because of its high mass, the companion could be a planet or a brown dwarf.
planet.imagedescription: This is a coronagraphic image of AB Pictoris. A planetary companion is visible on the lower left. It was optained with NACO on the VLT with an occulting mask on top of AB Pictoris. Credit: ESO.
